title: A possible path ahead for recovering atheists - with Nathan Meffert
description:
This clip was taken from "Christianity Rising", episode #6 of the Food For Free Thought Podcast with Nathan Meffert:  http://nathanmeffert.com/blog/christianity-rising-jonathan-pageau

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/PageauCarvings
